text: Moeketsi Majoro (born 3 November 1961) is a Mosotho economist and politician who has been serving as the sixth prime minister of Lesotho since May 2020. He was the minister of Finance in the cabinet of Tom Thabane from 2017 to 2020. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Prime ministers of Lesotho Category:Economists Category:Current national leaders
title: Moeketsi Majoro
